text: The Robert J. Dole Institute of Politics (often called the Dole Institute) is a nonpartisan political institution at the University of Kansas. It was created by the former U.S. Senator from Kansas and 1996 Republican presidential candidate Bob Dole. It opened on July 22, 2003. Lawrence Journal- World's article on the opening ceremony. Mentions things such as opening date, budget, location, etc. ==References== Category:University of Kansas Category:2003 establishments in the United States Category:Political organizations based in the United States
title: Robert J. Dole Institute of Politics
